description: This header file defines internal functions related to the CCSP Scalar Helper component for SNMP agent management, including functions for removing helpers, loading MIBs, registering handlers, getting and setting MIB values, and cache management.

methods.name: CcspScalarHelperLoadMibs
methods.description: Loads MIB files and associated libraries for the scalar helper.

methods.name: CcspScalarHelperRegisterMibHandler
methods.description: Registers the MIB handler for the scalar helper.

methods.name: CcspScalarHelperGetMibValues
methods.description: Retrieves MIB values in response to SNMP requests.

methods.name: CcspScalarHelperSetMibValues
methods.description: Sets MIB values in response to SNMP requests.

methods.name: CcspScalarHelperRefreshCache
methods.description: Refreshes the internal cache of the scalar helper.
